name: Magneton

ability.name: Enforced Alignment
ability.effect: No player can attach more than 1 Energy per turn. If any effect would cause extra energies to be attached, ignore it.

attacks.name: Magnet Pull
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Metal Pokemon. Reveal it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

attacks.name: Magnet Pulse
attacks.effect: If Magneton has a Lightning energy attached, this attach does 10 more damage.

flavor: Ever feel like a magnet in a great big machine?
